title: Judge's Anger Can Only Be Expressed Via Emojis
description:
On this weekend edition of our legal news podcast, On The Merits, Bloomberg Law editor Carmen Castro-Pagan tells us about a federal judge who grew so frustrated by a protracted discovery dispute that her feelings could only be expressed through with one simple character: ðŸ¤¯

Have feedback on this episode of On The Merits? Give us a call and leave a voicemail at 703-341-3690.
